name: Criterion.B
description:
Criterion.B is a Dallas-based branding and inbound marketing agency specializing in the commercial real estate industry. We provide ROI, drive business growth, and build brand identities for our clients. Weâ€™re driven by creativity and curiosity daily; evaluating all options, testing & measuring, and exploring new possibilities. Originally founded as Canonball in 2008, the company evolved in mindset and methodology, eventually rebranding as Criterion.B.
Criterion, a collection of stories, reflects our charge for storytelling, and B represents our drive to evaluate each effort, giving nod to our A/B testing approach.
